Reviews.Title: “Good value- I would stay here again.”
Reviews.Author: Valarien
Reviews.Content: I stayed two nights while attending an event at the Long Beach Convention Center. Everything near the convention center was sold out or very expensive. I have a car and this hotel is conviently located next to the 110 freeway entrance and exit. The drive over the bridge to Long Beach was scenic and easy. My room faced the freeway; surprisingly the noise did not bother me and I'm usually noise sensitive. The staff was friendly. The rooms were clean the bedding and furniture looked fairly new. I used the iron, refridgerator, hairdryer, coffee maker,tv-what more do you need? They also have a small pool and serve breakfast. The price was unbeatable with my triple A discount. If I had to complain about anything I would remember to bring my own pillow next time. The hotel pillows were hard foam and I looked forward to getting home to my more comfortable bed. Overall I was very happy with my experience and would stay here again in the future.

Reviews.Title: “nice but noisy”
Reviews.Author: rosa57701
Reviews.Content: one of the better Best Westerns I've stayed in but even with the recessed doors it was noisy due to automobile and airplane traffic

Reviews.Title: “definitely I will be back there again”
Reviews.Author: Atunia
Reviews.Content: First I stayed there for one night in July, didn't have a reservation. Room was big and clean, bed comfortable, for great price. I got back there in 2 days, on my way home.

Reviews.Title: “Great Place cCose to Port”
Reviews.Author: cammpalmer
Reviews.Content: 4-30-11: If you are looking for a hotel room close to the cruise port in San Pedro this one is a great place to stay. They donâ€™t offer shuttle service to the port, but it is just a $16.50 taxi ride to the port. I canâ€™t speak for all of the rooms in the hotel but the one that we stayed in was very clean. Not a speck of dust in the room (I looked). All new ceramic tile in the bathroom and it even had a phone. It appears to me that it had just been remodeled and had all new furniture and bed in it. It also had 3 washers and 3 dryer so you could do laundry if you wanted to. The Dennyâ€™s restaurant is the only place to eat within walking distance but we had a great meal. There is a convenience store just across the street as well.

Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel”
Reviews.Author: paddickp
Reviews.Content: The stay was great we chose this hotel because it was a short drive from the airport 20 minutes drive, there is a Dennys right next door. Still i dont think you can go wrong with a Best Western. A fantastic first night hotel which starts your holiday the way you want it to.

Reviews.Title: “Neat & Clean”
Reviews.Author: Debbie066
Reviews.Content: The hotel was neat and clean. The hot tub was nice. My only complaint was there was only 1 restaurant within walking distance - Dennys right next door. Breakfast was simple but well stocked.

Reviews.Title: “great service”
Reviews.Author: ohley
Reviews.Content: with a golf course and park adjacent to the hotel there is a lot more to the area than what first meets the eye, just a short trip from the keyser permanente health center and about ten minutes to great shopping in torrence, and close to the cruise terminals near Long Beach. There is even a fast transit connection to downtown just beside the 110 freeway, and for $2.45 you can get to the USC campus and downtown within 40 minutes.Staff was very helpful .

Reviews.Title: “Bad place!”
Reviews.Author: clarkci
Reviews.Content: I arrived at this hotel, no one behind front desk. Waited 20 minutes. Checked BA to see if desk person was sick. No one there! Shouted for someone 8 times. No answer. Finally, I yelled as loud as I could. A female came out from the shadows walking as slow as possible, glaring at me. Chilling! It was scary! She had my credit card number and I didn't know what to do next. I felt weird and very upset. I needed a cart to go to my room on 3rd floor. She was so oblivious & wouldn't offer to get me help. A stranger offered to find a cart or help me. He wasn't staying there, he was just there. No thank you! Flooding? Towels everywhere on floors.so elevators weren't working, had to lug my stuff up 3 floors.Called the front desk 3x's around 9:30pm. Loud noises above. water extractor running. Frt desk no help! Went up there myself to tell them to stop! I was right below a flooded 4th floor room. Very scary. I didn't sleep all nite. I am sickened by this treatment. It was much worse than these words can explain. I have a bites that won't go away now!

Reviews.Title: “Nice place”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: This hotel is quiet, has good parking, pool, location and nice accomodations. I would definitely stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “Stay Away!”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: After staying in this hotel for one night, I woke up to find my bed crawling with bed bugs and I got at least 200 bites that itched for three weeks! I told the manager while I was checking out and he didn't care at all. I made a complaint to Best Western and the hotel would not even contact them to address the problem. ...and the elevator doesn't work well, the people at the front desk are sketchy, my TV didn't work... But the place is truly infested with bed bugs! They are large and orange. Stay Away!

Reviews.Title: “A great "jumping off "point”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: The hotel is clean and spacious. They have plenty of parking available free while you are at sea. Only a ten minute ride to the port. Breakfast is rather meager - toast, donuts, but Denny's is right next door. If making a reservation other than directly with the hotel (i.e. Orbitz, Expedia, etc.) take all printouts of your confirmation proving you have paid the reservation through the travel company. Seems that bit of info doesn't always catch up to the hotel. All-in-all a good place.

Reviews.Title: “Okay”
Reviews.Author: likestotravel71
Reviews.Content: We stayed here one night as we were going on a cruise the next day. The rooms were quite big. Clean. Nothing special about them. Continental breakfast sucked. I have never seen a worse breakast then that. For advertising that they are close to the cruise ships, they didn't have a clue were the port was. I didn't really care for the location either.

Reviews.Title: “Clean, Good Location for Cruise Port”
Reviews.Author: scottstraveler
Reviews.Content: Nothing fancy but this was a clean hotel with good sized rooms - we had the room with 2 king beds - great location if you are taking a cruise - only about 5-10 minutes down the 110 freeway to the port

Reviews.Title: “Excellent value”
Reviews.Author: Twickenham0
Reviews.Content: We stayed at this hotel for 1 night before a cruise. Got a great rate thru Travelocity, $60+tax. The hotel was quite convenient, close enough to the cruise port, and with free parking and a Denny's right beside. It's an older property, decor slightly dated, but very clean and well maintained. The room was huge, with 2 king-sized beds and a small fridge. Free continental breakfast was very basic, toast and doughnuts, but just enough to tide us over. Not the best neighborhood, but definitely not the worst. Would stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “Good hotel and there's FREE PARKING!”
Reviews.Author: LiLiNF
Reviews.Content: We stayed at this hotel in October of 2003 for the Women's World Cup Soccer finals. Rates at other hotels during this time were ridiculous and I found an internet rate for this hotel for $49 CDN! It is a bit out of the way - especially if you don't have a car, but there is a lot to do (shopping, dining) in the area. The rooms were large and clean and the beds were comfortable. The only thing that I didn't like about our room was that the sink was not in the bathroom, but was installed in a long counter in the common area - not a big deal, I'm just being picky! There was a fridge in the room and breakfast was included - nothing fancy; toast, donuts, cofee and juice, but it helped. There is a Denny's next door. The staff was friendly and helpful but the best thing about the hotel was the free parking - and there's lots of it! Good hotel for the amount you're spending - if you don't mind staying outside of downtown LA, give this place a shot!

HotelInfo.Name: BEST WESTERN Los Angeles Worldport Hotel
HotelInfo.Address: 1402 West Pacific Coast Highway, Los Angeles, CA 90744
